caption:
Today in History: The Selma to Montgomery March Begins ✊🏾⁠
⁠
On March 21, 1965, thousands of brave souls set out on a 54-mile journey from Selma to Montgomery, demanding the right to vote. Led by Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., this march was a defining moment in the Civil Rights Movement, one that helped pave the way for the Voting Rights Act of 1965.⁠
⁠
The road wasn’t easy, but they marched anyway. They marched for justice, for equality, and for the generations that would come after them.⁠
⁠
Today, we honor their courage and their sacrifice. The fight for our rights didn’t end in 1965, and it’s on us to keep pushing forward. 💪🏾 #BlackHistory⁠
⁠
